CKAN

Unfortunately you did not provide us with enough information to assess your situation. There are many many many types of crashes in this game, caused by a multitude of different things.

Can you give us a better explanation of the crashes? Can you submit a proper bug report with the outputlog.txt file? After that we may be able to get somewhere. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
